content: i think i had just watched an episode of z-nation when i made this one it was the one with the glowing radioactive zombies woah glowing zombies so in remembrance of these glowing zombies i bring you my radioactive scrubs a washcloth with dueling soft yarn combined with scrubbing yarn in a fun glowing radioactive warning shape yeah bay-bee >this pattern is available for free at crochetkim com or by purchasing an ad-free print-ready version here click visit pattern website above or the link for more information below to see the free version
